I'm horrible at writing but I wanted to write this. My grammar might be bad :p
I'm not the best at English writinf

#1: http://pastebin.com/DMavk01i
#2: http://pastebin.com/4YB3Dtx5
Story: Steven and his team must survive nebula matches against other teams and survive the Nexus world and find a way out of it.

Current Nebula Teams(5 players per team)(Randomly selected players)

Team Infiníte: Steven, Badger, Vlad, Seth, and Poker

Team Aeriel Warriors: ICarnage, Alexander, Kiwi, Jord, Astro

Team Warlords: Pedro, MLGPorky, Numberz_, EmeraldSword, Splade
